sentences.sContent: This happy event--supposing it to be such--could only have occurred at an unpremeditated moment.
sentences.sContent_eng: This happy event--supposing it to be such--could only have occurred at an unpremeditated moment.
sentences.sCn: 这件愉快的事情——就算它愉快——只能发生在毫无预谋的时刻。

remMethod.val: un(不) + premeditated(预谋的) → 无预谋的

trans.tranCn: 无预谋的， 非故意的
